DOC.brief_summary: The present study design investigate whether high protein diet preserve muscle mass caloric restriction old adult .
DOC.brief_title: Protect - The Impact High Protein Diet Preservation Muscle Mass
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese subject ( BMI 2740 kg/m2 ) Waist circumference male : ≥ 102 cm , female : ≥ 88 cm Willingness ability comply protocol Renal insufficiency Comorbidities Type 1 & 2 diabetic ( Fasting glucose level ≥ 7 mmol/L ) Cancer COPD Participation weight loss program 3 month intervention Participation heavy resistancetype exercise training ( > 1 wk ) last 2 . Intentional unintentional weight loss ( > 3 kg last 3 month ) Severe loss appetite Diagnosed allergy milk product Gastric bypass Supplements medication use weight loss Participation intervention trial Women participate postmenopausal ( last period ≥ year ago )
